configuration.description: The IBM Cloud API Token
Prefix name for all related resources
Region where resources will be created
An existing resource group name to use for this example, if unset a new resource group will be created
Optional list of tags to be added to created resources

flavors.label: Basic
flavors.name: basic
flavors.usage_template:
module "basic" {
  source           = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=${{name}}&version=${{version}}"
  ibmcloud_api_key = var.ibmcloud_api_key
  region           = "us-south"
  prefix           = "test-cos"
  resource_tags    = var.resource_tags
  resource_group   = var.resource_group
}

configuration.description: Optional list of access tags to be added to the created resources
Specify the cross-regional bucket location. Supported values are 'us', 'eu', and 'ap'.
Optionally pass an existing activity tracker instance CRN to use in the example. If not passed, a new instance will be provisioned
The IBM Cloud API Token
The type of endpoint for the IBM terraform provider to use to manage the bucket. (public, private, direct)
Prefix name for all related resources
Region where resources will be created
An existing resource group name to use for this example, if unset a new resource group will be created
Optional list of tags to be added to created resources

flavors.label: Complete
flavors.name: complete
flavors.usage_template:
module "complete" {
  source           = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=${{name}}&version=${{version}}"
  ibmcloud_api_key = var.ibmcloud_api_key
  region           = "us-south"
  prefix           = "test-cos"
  resource_tags    = var.resource_tags
  access_tags      = var.access_tags
  resource_group   = var.resource_group
  cross_region_location = var.cross_region_location
  management_endpoint_type_for_bucket = var.management_endpoint_type_for_bucket
  existing_at_instance_crn = var.existing_at_instance_crn
}

flavors.name: existing-resources
flavors.usage_template:
module "existing-resources" {
  source           = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=${{name}}&version=${{version}}"
  ibmcloud_api_key = var.ibmcloud_api_key

diagrams.description: This is the FS Cloud example.

configuration.description: Optional list of access tags to be added to the created resources
Optionally pass an existing activity tracker instance CRN to use in the example. If not passed, a new instance will be provisioned
The IBM Cloud API Token
Prefix name for all related resources
The GUID of the Hyper Protect Crypto service in which the key specified in var.hpcs_key_crn is coming from
CRN of the Hyper Protect Crypto service to use to encrypt the data in the COS bucket
region for the primary bucket
Region where resources will be created
An existing resource group name to use for this example, if unset a new resource group will be created
Optional list of tags to be added to created resources
The GUID of the Hyper Protect Crypto service in which the key specified in var.hpcs_key_crn is coming from
CRN of the Hyper Protect Crypto service to use to encrypt the data in the COS bucket
region for the secondary bucket

flavors.label: FS Cloud
flavors.name: fscloud
flavors.usage_template:
module "fscloud" {
  source           = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=${{name}}&version=${{version}}"
  ibmcloud_api_key = var.ibmcloud_api_key
  region           = "us-south"
  prefix           = "test-cos-fscloud"
  resource_tags    = var.resource_tags
  primary_region   = var.primary_region
  secondary_region = var.secondary_region
  resource_group   = var.resource_group
  access_tags      = var.access_tags
  primary_existing_hpcs_instance_guid = var.primary_existing_hpcs_instance_guid
  secondary_existing_hpcs_instance_guid = var.secondary_existing_hpcs_instance_guid
  primary_hpcs_key_crn = var.primary_hpcs_key_crn
  secondary_hpcs_key_crn = var.secondary_hpcs_key_crn
  existing_at_instance_crn = var.existing_at_instance_crn
}
